body:
Chantal,

Since this is the second time in the last two weeks that someone has
erroneously attributed the three-phase method to me, I'll point out that
Greg Ward is responsible for the Three-Phase method.  I simply wrote the
tutorial.

Also, German offers good advice!

Andy


On Tue, Aug 27, 2013 at 7:08 AM, minchaca <miinchaca at gmail.com> wrote:
